summary.span: 及其所有公开成员均属于组件对象模型 (COM) 辅助功能接口的托管包装器。

span.span: The and all of its exposed members are part of a managed wrapper for the Component Object Model (COM) accessibility interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅[Microsoft Active Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd373592(v=vs.85).aspx)文档。For more information about , see the [Microsoft Active Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd373592(v=vs.85).aspx) documentation.
